## extend() function

Equivalent of Object.assign, which IE11 does not support.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function extend<T>(o1: T, o2: T, keys?: string[]): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  o1 | T |  |
|  o2 | T |  |
|  keys | string\[\] | Optional list of keys to use to copy values from <code>o2</code> to <code>o1</code>. If this is not provided, all values are copied. |

<b>Returns:</b>

T
